objects.text:
• Active Noise Cancellation
• 20 Hours Battery Life
• Personalized Spatial Audio

product_details.name: Apple AirPods Max Wireless Over-Ear Headphones, Active Noise Cancelling, Transparency Mode, Personalized Spatial Audio, Dolby Atmos, Bluetooth Headphones for iPhone – Pink
product_details.description: Headphones Jack: Lightning. Model Name: AirPods Max. Connectivity Technology: Wireless, Wired. Wireless Communication Technology: Bluetooth, NFC. Age Range (Description): Adult. Material: memory foam. Specific Uses For Product: Music. Recommended Uses For Product: Calling, Recording, Exercising, Gaming, Disc Jockey Use. Compatible Devices: Cellphones, Tablets, Telephones, Music Production Equipment, Laptops, Desktops. Theme: TV Series. Control Type: Call Control, Media Control, Volume Control, Voice Control, Noise Control. Cable Feature: Detachable. Item Weight: 13.6 ounces. Water Resistance Level: Not Water Resistant. Unit Count: 1.0 Count. Style: Lightning. Control Method: Touch. Number of Items: 1. Battery Life: 20 Hour. Product Dimensions: 9.43 x 9.57 x 3.15 inches. Language: English, English, English, English, English. Batteries: 2 Lithium Ion batteries required. (included).

banner_details:
This promotional banner features a modern and dynamic layout to advertise a pair of wireless headphones. The background is split into four quadrants using subtle red-toned blocks with a low opacity grid overlay that adds structure. Text layer `heading_1` and `heading_2` deliver a bold, impactful headline in a vibrant red color. The `tagline` text underneath offers a sleek subheading in uppercase typography. Text layer `description` uses bullet points to list product features in a clean and structured layout. The bold `price` text stands out prominently in red, complemented by a clear `cta_button` rectangle with the `cta` text in white for the call-to-action. The right side visually balances the design with a scaled hi-res `product_image` of the headphones, centrally placed. Additional white decorative dots appear near the product for accent.

**Color Palette:**
- Vibrant Red: `#FF3333`
- Pale Red: `#FFF0F0`
- Medium Coral: `#FF8585`
- Light Gray: `#F0F0F0`
- Soft Pink: `#FFCACA`
- Charcoal Text: `#333333`, `#444444`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image showcases sleek, modern headphones in a vibrant yet elegant color palette. Dominated by warm red and soft pink hues, the design balances vibrancy and sophistication. The headband features a vivid Coral Red (#F44336) that transitions into a soft mesh gradient, seamlessly blending into the Pink Salmon ear cushions (#FF6F61). The ear cups have a smooth metallic finish in Rose Gold (#B76E79), offering a subtle contrast while enhancing the luxurious feel. Accents of Silver (#C0C0C0) at the joints bring a crisp, modern touch. This color combination creates visual harmony while highlighting different components through tonal variations and material textures.
